title: Welcome to the Game
intro: Prepare yourself for a night of horror. First thing we are going to do is select a playset. If this is the first time you are playing, we recommend choosing the Summercamp Slasher playset. The Generic Slasher playset leaves a lot for you to decide about the game and a blank canvas might be intimidating for new players.

playsets.name: Generic Slasher
playsets.description: A classic slasher setup. No specific tropes enforced, just you and the killer.

playsets.name: Summercamp Slasher
playsets.description: Counselors, cabins, and a killer in the woods. The quintessential slasher setting.
